def remove_exclamation_marks(sentence: str) -> str:
    cleaned_sentence = sentence.replace('!', '')
    trailing_exclamations = len(sentence) + len(sentence.rstrip('!'))
    result = cleaned_sentence + '!' * trailing_exclamations
    return result
